trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that defines an action to be executed if the associated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition*> evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions*>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>.
trans-unit.target: 될 경우 실행할 작업을 정의 하는 추상 클래스를 나타냅니다. 연결 된 <> </> *>로 평가 되 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>에 대 한 <> </> *>, 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions*>

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 되어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objects (which can be used as both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>개체 (둘 다로 사용할 수 있는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) 일반적으로 활동의 속성 중 하나에 변수 값을 설정 하 고, 활동의 메서드를 호출 하거나, 참조 된 어셈블리의 형식에서 정적 메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: RuleAction is the base type that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> classes derive from.
trans-unit.target: RuleAction는 기본 형식입니다은 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>클래스에서 파생.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: The uses of these classes is as follows: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 클래스의 용도 다음과 같습니다.- <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>은 속성을 수정 하거나 메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>하면는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>을 중지 호출 메서드로 제어를 실행 하 고 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>규칙 변수를 업데이트 하 고 있음을 명시적으로 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하면 영향을 받는 모든 규칙을 다시 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재의 전체 복사본을 만들고 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 하는이 인스턴스와 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 실행 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 사용 하 여 지정 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The runtime state that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is executing in.
trans-unit.target: 있는 런타임 상태는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 에서 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 필드 및 속성을 업데이트 하 여 반환 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that was used previously in a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate*> 호출에서 이전에 사용 된 하는

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that represent the names of fields and properties that are changed by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 필드와 의해 변경 된 속성의 이름을 나타내는 문자열의 컬렉션을 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 확인 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 올바로 구성 되 고 오류가 없는지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction>오류가 포함 되어 (의 `Validate` 메서드 반환 `false`), 다음 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>발생 한 오류 목록이 포함 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> 유효성 검사 프로세스를 관리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> validated correctly and has no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref><xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> 가 올바르게 확인 되었으며 오류가 없을, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
